com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.state

Interface ISCUIStateProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SCUIStateProvider

    public interface ISCUIStateProvider
    A provider interface which manages saving/retrieving of UI state
    This interface needs to be implemented by applications for handling the save/retrieval of UI state.
    Plugging the implementation:
    The implementation can be plugged into the framework using one of the following methods:
    • Making the below web.xml context parameter entry 
              <context-param>
                <param-name>scui-uistate-provider</param-name>
                <param-value>Fully qualified class name of the implementation</param-value>
        </context-param>
    • Calling the SCUIStateHelper#setUIStateProvider(javax.servlet.ServletContext, ISCUIStateProvider) utility method
    statikonda SCUIState SCUIStateHelper

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList getListOfUIStatesForScreen(java.lang.String userId, java.lang.String screenId, java.lang.String applicationId, SCUIContext uiContext)
      Retrieves the full list of state information for all components belonging to the specified screen userId The user identifier whose state preference is being stored in this object screenId The identifier of the screen to which the component belongs applicationId The identifier of the application to which the screen belongs uiContext The current UI context The complete state information of all the components belonging to the screen, or null if it does not exist
      SCUIState getUIState(java.lang.String userId, java.lang.String componentId, java.lang.String screenId, java.lang.String applicationId, SCUIContext uiContext)
      Retrieves the state of the given component based on the parameters passed userId The user identifier whose state preference is being stored in this object componentId The identifier of the component whose state preference is being stored in this object screenId The identifier of the screen to which the component belongs applicationId The identifier of the application to which the screen belongs uiContext The current UI context The state for the component, or null if it does not exist
      void init(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
      Utility method to perform initialization, called only once in the life cycle.
      boolean saveUIState(SCUIState uiState, SCUIContext uiContext)
      Save/Persist the provided state object uiState The state to be saved uiContext The current UI context True if state was saved, false otherwise
      boolean saveUIStatesList(java.util.ArrayList uiStateList, SCUIContext uiContext)
      Save/Persist the provided list of state objects uiStateList The list of state objects to be saved uiContext The current UI context True if state was saved, false otherwise
